ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Implements inequality constrained inference. This includes parameter estimation in normal (linear) models under linear equality and inequality constraints, as well as normal likelihood ratio tests involving inequality-constrained hypotheses. For inequality-constrained linear models, averaging over R-squared for different orderings of regressors is also included.

Implements inequality constrained inference. This includes parameter estimation in normal (linear) models under linear equality and inequality constraints, as well as normal likelihood ratio tests involving inequality-constrained hypotheses. For inequality-constrained linear models, averaging over R-squared for different orderings of regressors is also included.

name: r-ic.infer
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.1-7" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ic.infer
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ic.infer_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ic.infer/ic.infer_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 055329e68eb3b9ab5248a58ede2c6f45faa8b6678c938b8e287c4db0b53d213f

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 2
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-boot
    - r-kappalab
    - r-mvtnorm
    - r-quadprog
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-boot
    - r-kappalab
    - r-mvtnorm
    - r-quadprog

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ic.infer')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ic.infer')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://prof.beuth-hochschule.de/groemping/
  license: GPL (>= 2)
  summary: Implements inequality constrained inference. This includes parameter estimation in normal (linear) models under linear equality and inequality constraints, as well as normal likelihood ratio tests involving inequality-constrained hypotheses. For inequality-constrained linear models, averaging over R-squared for
    different orderings of regressors is also included.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
